inair.view

Class UIView

  • java.lang.Object
    • inair.data.DependencyObject
      • inair.data.IAElement
        • inair.view.UIView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UIImageView, UILayeredViewItem, UIRectView, UITextView, UIViewGroup

    public class UIView
extends IAElement

    This class represents the basic building block for user interface components. A View occupies a rectangular area on the screen and is responsible for drawing and event handling. View is the base class for widgets, which are used to create interactive UI components (text fields, image, etc.). The UIViewGroup subclass is the base class for layouts, which are invisible containers that hold other UIViews (or other UIViewGroups) and define their layout properties.

    Created by Linh Nguyen

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.

    • Method Detail

      • attachNode

        public final void attachNode()
        Final method attachNode call for attach this view to render tree

        when view is attached, graphic of view will appear on screen after all resources of this view are loaded in core system

      • attachRenderNode

        protected boolean attachRenderNode()
        Protected method Override to custom attach render node behavior
        Returns:
        true if successful attached, false if not

      • detachNode

        public final void detachNode()
        Final method detachNode call for detach this view from render tree when view is detached, graphic of view on screen will disappear

      • detachRenderNode

        protected boolean detachRenderNode()
        Protected method Override to custom detach render node behavior
        Returns:
        true if successful detached, false if not

      • findUIViewById

        public final UIView findUIViewById(int id)
        Look for a child view with the given id. If this view has the given id, return this view.
        Parameters:
        id - The id to search for.
        Returns:
        The view that has the given id in the hierarchy or null

      • findViewTraversal

        protected UIView findViewTraversal(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the view to be found
        Returns:
        the view of the specified id, null if cannot be found

        public float getAlpha()
        Get current alpha of this view
        Returns:
        current alpha in float

        public float[] getTransform()
        Get transform matrix of this view
        Returns:
        an array with 16 float numbers

      • getWidth

        public float getWidth()

      • invalidate

        protected void invalidate()
        Invalidate the whole view

      • onFinishInflate

        protected void onFinishInflate()
        Finalize inflating a view from XML. This is called as the last phase of inflation, after all child views have been added. Even if the subclass overrides onFinishInflate, they should always be sure to call the super method, so that we get called.

      • renderNodeFactory

        protected Node renderNodeFactory()
        Protected method - must be override on custom view

        Method to build graphic by one or multi render node for this view

        Returns:
        render node

      • requestLayout

        public void requestLayout()
        Call this when something has changed which has invalidated the layout of this view. This will schedule a layout pass of the view tree.

      • setAlpha

        public void setAlpha(float alpha)
        Set alpha for this view
        Parameters:
        alpha - float value in range of [0..1]

        if value less than 0, it will be transparent like 0 alpha

        if value greater than 1, it will be opaque like 1 alpha

      • setBinding

        public void setBinding(DependencyProperty dp,
              Binding bindingObject)
        Method to binding dependency property of this instance with binding object
        Parameters:
        dp - dependency property to bind
        bindingObject - binding object

      • setTransform

        public void setTransform(float[] transform)
        Set transform matrix of this view

        throw IllegalArgumentException if array's length isn't 16

        Parameters:
        transform - an array contain exactly 16 float numbers
